nodes.text: i’m sorry because just what the hell... when we have medical evidence of the myriad causes of depression, many of which are connected to systemic racism? maybe read a book before WRITING A TEXTBOOK
“depression” and “no depression” is such a stretch lmfao. this is why we need psychologists, psychiatrists etc with a decolonial framework https://t.co/L1xfQRsuJx
